text: for that sort of TDD purpose (and other reasons, like monitoring a visualisation or debugging some intermediate value) I'd love the ability to "pin" cells to the left/right of the screen, having them remain visible as I write other stuff

text: I’d like to be able to “pin” plots, and/or have them appear in a floating pop up window. (Maybe these ideas should go in the “feedback” box at the bottom of every Pluto notebook... :sweat_smile:)
